mapper.insert:
SELECT gen_random_uuid()
insert into attendance_logs (id, employee_id, check_time, type, latitude, longitude, device_id, network_ip, image_url, is_valid, created_at) values (#{id,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{employeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{networkIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isValid,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update attendance_logs set employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_time = #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, network_ip = #{networkIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_url = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=BIT}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=OTHER}
mapper.select: select 'false' as QUERYID,id, employee_id, check_time, type, latitude, longitude, device_id, network_ip, image_url, is_valid, created_at from attendance_logs where id = #{id,jdbcType=OTHER}
select id, employee_id, check_time, type, latitude, longitude, device_id, network_ip, image_url, is_valid, created_at from attendance_logs
